reviews.text: Such a nice relaxing environment for tapas style food and artisan beers. Great quality wine and really nice atmosphere and very reasonable price. Great for groups to share and also for couples. The ham is delicious of course but they add great cheeses, fried fruits, pickles etc

Great local bar with a wide selection of craft beers both local and global. Try the flights and then take your choice from there. Match with a wide selection of cheese and of course Ham :-). Friendly and helpful staff will keep you on track and help with choice. A great spot for a Quick lunch or an evening drink

Food was phenomenal. Beer selection amazing. Service. Terrible. We waited a half hour for a drink order when sitting down. No one came so we  went to the bar. We were told we take it at the table. Someone came by promptly. Then came the refill time. Same thing had to stand up to get service. And with the food order had to stand. Don't think I'll be going again.

Can straight from the airport to get some breakfast and it was phenomenal. We had a mix of breakfast sandwiches, the breakfast plate and steak and eggs. Everything was delicious including the coffee but the toast was the definite stand out. Highly recommend this little place. No sign out front but it's next to the Beijing Acupuncture shop.

Although the Greedy Pig is a little off the beaten track, it's definitely worth the trip! From mouth-watering sandwiches to some of the best cheesecake this side of New York, there really is something for everyone. Despite being a die hard meat consumer, the vegetarian offerings were enough to send my mind spinning! The Greedy Pig also host the most amazing supper clubs at different venues in the city so if you get the chance, don't miss out.

Fair pizza. An alternative to the other companies. The pizza toppings are fresh and some of the flavours come through. I suspect the company use less salt and seasoning than others, so perhaps some ingredients come across as a little flat. The staff are polite and friendly.
Fantastic pizza restaurant/take-away. Forget about dominos round the corner, this is the place to get your pizza from, cheaper and if offers numerous pizza topping options!

OK so the pizza - bases are really good here they taste really authentic and are not too heavy on the gut. But ... yes there is a but. Considering I ordered a pizza with a hell of allot of toppings to delight the taste buds it was really blooming bland ! the toppings tasted really cheap and flavourless for example the mushrooms were definitely tinned and it made the base really watery. My better half ordered a Greek pizza with feta, olives and all kinds of other things but in agreement said it was really bland a flavourless..

We had an excellent lunch today at the Woolly Sheep Inn. My tomato butternut squash soup was wonderful and accompanied by a freshly baked warm mini-bread loaf. I also had a side of lovely garlicky hummus. My husband loved his apple pear tart with homemade ice cream, beautifully presented.

The food was well presented and the waitress service was excellent. Our only disappointment was the coffee which we had unfortunately chosen instead of the divine desserts on offer. It was too weak and of poor quality although purported to be Costa coffee.

The service was great and the restaurant had a pub in front, two quaint rooms with tables for eating, and even a very cute outdoor area for warm weather eating so it seemed to be perfect no matter what mood you might be in. They also offered free wifi which we appreciated since we did not have any cell service in The UK. And the bill was really decent too.

A fantastic Restaurant, this family run business has all the atmosphere that you could wish for. Friendly service without being intrusive and splendid food at a reasonable price. Locally sourced products which is always a bonus. Have been severaltimes and not been disappointed yet. Car parking at the front and the back. Lovely seating area in the warmer months.
Friendly service, nice food. Portions could be slightly bigger and need to improve communication between service and kitchen. Enjoyed overall and would recommend to others.
